column4: everyone that's here posting frantically is, everyone else is fine
ahh true, that is why i never upgrade, full install only
yeah, I tried the upgrade... things just werem't quite right, so yeah, backup /home and reinstall :)

i keep one slice on my hard drive for the next release and then swap after it is stable i wrote a shell to perform all the apt-gets i need and then another shell to rsync important files from my rsync repository and wala works about 95%
